prompts.name: Marketing Strategy Plan
prompts.description: This template facilitates the creation of a comprehensive marketing strategy. Replace {{business goals}} with your company's strategic goals, {{target market}} with your ideal customer demographic, {{competitive analysis}} with your assessment of market competition, and {{marketing tactics}} with your proposed marketing methods.
prompts.content: Draft a robust marketing strategy reflecting key {{business goals}}, carefully defined {{target market}}, detailed {{competitive analysis}}, and a wide array of innovative {{marketing tactics}}. Evade divulging classified information about new products, service offerings, or confidential business strategies.

prompts.name: Market Research Report
prompts.description: This template serves to structure a market research report. Substitute {{research objectives}} with your specific goals for the research, {{research methodology}} with your conducted survey or study methods, {{findings}} with the data gathered, and {{recommendations}} with your proposed decisions based on the findings.
prompts.content: Pencil in a market research report that clarifies the {{research objectives}}, validates the {{research methodology}}, provides an exhaustive review of the {{findings}}, and offers impactful {{recommendations}}. Be careful not to disclose sensitive information about participants or proprietary analysis techniques.

prompts.name: Product Launch Plan
prompts.description: Use this template to design an effective product launch plan. Replace {{product details}} with specifics about the new product, {{launch timeline}} with your intended launch schedule, {{promotion strategies}} with marketing methods to be used, and {{success metrics}} with the criteria for determining the success of the launch.
prompts.content: Assemble a product launch plan that introduces the {{product details}}, outlines the {{launch timeline}}, incorporates ambitious {{promotion strategies}}, and establishes clear {{success metrics}}. Refrain from including competitive secrets, confidential product details, or vague and unrealistic goals.

prompts.name: Content Marketing Calendar
prompts.description: This template guides you in crafting a content marketing calendar. Substitute {{content themes}} with your themes for content, {{publication dates}} with timings for each content release, {{content types}} with the various formats of content, and {{performance measurements}} with metrics for evaluating the content's success.
prompts.content: Devise a content marketing calendar that specifies intriguing {{content themes}}, fixed {{publication dates}}, engaging {{content types}}, and utilises quantifiable {{performance measurements}}. Be mindful not to reveal industry secrets, confidential campaign information, or sensitive metrics.

prompts.name: Digital Marketing Campaign
prompts.description: This template assists in the development of a digital marketing campaign. Replace {{campaign objectives}} with specific, measurable goals for the campaign, {{target audience}} with your ideal digital customers, {{channels}} with chosen digital platforms, and {{evaluation metric}} with your method for assessing the campaign’s effectiveness.
prompts.content: Build a diligent digital marketing campaign detailing the focused {{campaign objectives}}, your defined {{target audience}}, suitable {{channels}}, and the adoption of an appropriate {{evaluation metric}}. Avoid sharing confidential data, customer insights securely held, or proprietary marketing tactics.

prompts.name: Brand Strategy Development
prompts.description: This outline assists in generating a robust brand strategy. Substitute {{brand vision}} with your overall brand aspiration, {{value proposition}} with unique aspects of your brand, {{customer personas}} with the typical profiles of your targeted customers, and {{brand touchpoints}} with interactions customers have with your brand.
prompts.content: Formulate a brand strategy characterising a compelling {{brand vision}}, a distinct {{value proposition}}, comprehensive {{customer personas}}, and essential {{brand touchpoints}}. Steer clear of any information that could undermine the brand's image or share closely-guarded company secrets.

prompts.name: Customer Relationship Management Plan
prompts.description: This blueprint is for devising a customer relationship management (CRM) plan. Replace {{CRM goals}} with your objectives for customer relationships, {{customer segmentation}} with how you plan to categorise customers, {{communication strategies}} with interaction plans, and {{retention tactics}} with ways to maintain customer loyalty.
prompts.content: Develop a CRM plan incorporating concrete {{CRM goals}}, precise {{customer segmentation}}, forward-thinking {{communication strategies}}, and well-thought-out {{retention tactics}}. Avoid referencing specific customer examples or sensitive data protected by data privacy laws.

prompts.name: Competitive Analysis Report
prompts.description: This template will guide you in shaping a competitive analysis report. Substitute {{industry overview}} with a general view of the market your business operates in, {{competitors}} with key opponents in your field, {{competitive positioning}} with your stance compared to competitors, and {{action steps}} with strategic plans based on your findings.
prompts.content: Craft a competitive analysis report aptly summarising the {{industry overview}}, profiling dominant {{competitors}}, assessing your {{competitive positioning}}, and proposing clear-cut {{action steps}}. Refrain from making defamatory comments or unfounded claims about competitors.

prompts.name: Social Media Marketing Strategy
prompts.description: Use this template to construct an effective social media marketing strategy. Replace {{social media objectives}} with your goals for social media presence, {{target audience}} with whom your content will aim to reach, {{content strategy}} with your plan for what types of posts to share, and {{performance indicators}} with your chosen metrics for tracking success.
prompts.content: Conceive a social media marketing strategy outlining compelling {{social media objectives}}, clarifying your {{target audience}}, curating a coherent {{content strategy}}, and monitoring key {{performance indicators}}. Avoid divulging sensitive company insider information or detailed demographic data about followers.

prompts.name: Email Marketing Campaign
prompts.description: This template aids in building an efficient email marketing campaign. Substitute {{campaign goals}} with your defined targets for the campaign, {{subscriber segments}} with your specific customer groups, {{email content}} with the nature of emails to be sent, and {{evaluation metric}} with how you intend to assess the campaign’s effectiveness.
prompts.content: Architect an email marketing campaign setting out your {{campaign goals}}, analysing the {{subscriber segments}}, designing engaging {{email content}}, and setting a clear {{evaluation metric}}. Be sure to ensure content is compliant with spam legislation and that any personal data is handled and stored safely.
